Messages.ChatHelp: Use '/authlevel player authlevel' to set the auth level for player
Messages.ConsoleHelp: Use 'authlevel player authlevel' to set the auth level for player
Messages.InvalidAuthLevel: Invalid auth level! Valid levels are 0 (player), 1 (moderator), and 2 (owner)
Messages.InvalidTarget: Invalid player name! Please try again
Messages.NoPermission: You do not have permission to use this command!
